sourcesContent:
<template>
  <g class="re-or">
    <g v-for="(item, index1) in orExpression['composition']" :key="computeItemKey(index1)">
        <RENode v-if="item['type'] == 'node'" :nodeExpression="item" :key="item.key"></RENode>
        <REPath v-if="item['type'] == 'path'" :pathExpression="item" :key="item.key"></REPath>
        <REOr v-if="item['type'] == 'or'" :orExpression="item" :key="item.key"></REOr>
    </g>
    <path v-if="orExpression['or']" :d="orCompute" />
    <g v-if="orExpression['branch']">
        <path :d="leftBracketBranchCompute" @click="updateSelectedOr()"/>
        <path :d="rightBracketBranchCompute" @click="updateSelectedOr()"/>
        <text v-if="checkBranchRepeat()" :transform="branchRepeatTransform" style="alignment-baseline: hanging;">{{orExpression['branchRepeat'][0]}}..{{orExpression['branchRepeat'][1]}}</text>
    </g>
    <path :d="leftBracketCompute" @click="updateSelectedOr()" @dblclick="updateSelectedPart" :class="{'highlighted': getOrHighlightState }"/>
    <rect :transform="leftBracketRectTransform" @click="updateSelectedOr()" @dblclick="updateSelectedPart" class="rect-cover" width="10" height="30" opacity="0"/>
    <path :d="rightBracketCompute" @click="updateSelectedOr()" @dblclick="updateSelectedPart" :class="{'highlighted': getOrHighlightState }"/>
    <rect :transform="rightBracketRectTransform" @click="updateSelectedOr()" @dblclick="updateSelectedPart" class="rect-cover" width="10" height="30" opacity="0"/>
    <text v-if="checkRepeat()" :transform="repeatTransform" style="alignment-baseline: hanging;">{{orExpression['repeat'][0]}}..{{orExpression['repeat'][1]}}</text>
    <rect class="upper-rect" v-if="orExpression['upper']" width="10" height="10" :transform="upperTransform" />
    <path v-if="orExpression['selected']" :d="selectedCompute" />
  </g>
</template>

<script>
    import { mapState, mapMutations } from 'vuex';
    import RENode from '@/views/REView/REComponents/RENode.vue';
    import REOr from '@/views/REView/REComponents/REOr.vue';

export default {
  name: 'REOr',
  components: {
    RENode,
    REOr
  },
  props: {
    orExpression:{
      type: Object
    }
  },
  beforeCreate() {
    this.$options.components.REPath = require("@/views/REView/REComponents/REPath.vue").default;
  },
  data() {
    return {

    }
  },

  mounted() {

  },
  watch: {
      displayMode: function() {
        console.log('displayMode')
      }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapState([
      'displayMode',
      'selectedDom',
      'selectedDomKey'
    ]),
    getOrHighlightState () {
        // if (this.selectedNode != null) {
        //     console.log('selectedNode', this.selectedNode, this.selectedNodeKey, 'nodeExpression key', this.nodeExpression.key)
        // }
        return this.orExpression.key === this.selectedDomKey
    },
    leftBracketTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.orExpression['xLeftBracket']}, ${this.orExpression['yLeftBracket']})`
    },
    rightBracketTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.orExpression['xRightBracket']}, ${this.orExpression['yRightBracket']})`
    },
    repeatTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.orExpression['xRepeat']}, ${this.orExpression['yRepeat']})`
    },
    upperTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.orExpression['xUpper']}, ${this.orExpression['yUpper']})`
    },
    leftBracketCompute()
	{
        var x1 = this.orExpression['x1LeftBracket']
        var y1 = this.orExpression['y1LeftBracket']
        var x2 = this.orExpression['x2LeftBracket']
        var y2 = this.orExpression['y2LeftBracket']

        var qx = x1-(y2-y1)/3
        var qy = (y2+y1)/2

    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" Q " + qx + " " + qy + " " + x2 + " " + y2 );
    },
    leftBracketRectTransform(){
      var x1 = this.orExpression['x1LeftBracket']
      var y1 = this.orExpression['y1LeftBracket']
      var x2 = this.orExpression['x2LeftBracket']
      var y2 = this.orExpression['y2LeftBracket']

      var qx = x1-(y2-y1)/3 + 5
      var qy = (y2+y1)/2
      return `translate(${qx}, ${this.orExpression['y1LeftBracket']})`
    },
    rightBracketCompute()
	{
        var x1 = this.orExpression['x1RightBracket']
        var y1 = this.orExpression['y1RightBracket']
        var x2 = this.orExpression['x2RightBracket']
        var y2 = this.orExpression['y2RightBracket']

        var qx = x1+(y2-y1)/3
        var qy = (y2+y1)/2

    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" Q " + qx + " " + qy + " " + x2 + " " + y2 );
    },
    rightBracketRectTransform(){
        var x1 = this.orExpression['x1RightBracket']
        var y1 = this.orExpression['y1RightBracket']
        var x2 = this.orExpression['x2RightBracket']
        var y2 = this.orExpression['y2RightBracket']

        var qx = x1 - 5
        var qy = (y2+y1)/2
        return `translate(${qx}, ${this.orExpression['y1RightBracket']})`
    },
    orCompute(){
        var x1 = this.orExpression['xOr']
        var y1 = this.orExpression['yOr']


    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" v " + 45);
    },
    branchRepeatTransform(){
        return `translate(${this.orExpression['xBranchRepeat']}, ${this.orExpression['yBranchRepeat']})`
    },
    leftBracketBranchCompute()
	{
        var x1 = this.orExpression['x1LeftBranchBracket']
        var y1 = this.orExpression['y1LeftBranchBracket'] + 6
        var x2 = this.orExpression['x2LeftBranchBracket']
        var y2 = this.orExpression['y2LeftBranchBracket'] - 6

        var midx = x1-(y2-y1)/2
        var midy = (y2+y1)/2

    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" L " + midx + " " + midy + 
                " L " + x2+ " " + y2  );
    },
    rightBracketBranchCompute()
	{
        var x1 = this.orExpression['x1RightBranchBracket']
        var y1 = this.orExpression['y1RightBranchBracket'] + 6
        var x2 = this.orExpression['x2RightBranchBracket']
        var y2 = this.orExpression['y2RightBranchBracket'] - 6

        var midx = x1+(y2-y1)/2
        var midy = (y2+y1)/2

    	return ( "M " +  x1 + " " +  y1 +
         		" L " + midx + " " + midy + 
                " L " + x2+ " " + y2  );
    },
    selectedCompute(){
        var x1 = this.orExpression['x1Selected']
        var x2 = this.orExpression['x2Selected']
        var y1 = this.orExpression['ySelected']

        return ( "M " + x1 + " " + y1 + 
                 "H " + x2)
    },
   
  },
  methods: {
    ...mapMutations([
      'UPDATE_SELECTED_DOM',
      'UPDATE_SELECTED_PART'
    ]),
    computeItemKey(d){
        return 'item'+d
    },
    checkRepeat(){
        if('repeat' in this.orExpression)
            if(this.orExpression['repeat'][0]!=1 || this.orExpression['repeat'][1]!=1)
                return true
        return false
    },
    checkBranchRepeat(){
        if('branchRepeat' in this.orExpression)
            if(this.orExpression['branchRepeat'][0]!=1 || this.orExpression['branchRepeat'][1]!=1)
                return true
        return false
    },
    updateSelectedOr(){
      this.UPDATE_SELECTED_DOM(this.orExpression)
    },
    updateSelectedPart(){
        if('selected' in this.orExpression){
            this.orExpression['selected'] = !this.orExpression['selected']
        }
        else{
            this.orExpression['selected'] = true
        }
        this.UPDATE_SELECTED_PART()
    },
    
  }
}
</script>

<!-- Add "scoped" attribute to limit CSS to this component only -->
<style scoped lang="less">
.re-or {
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  .re-cover{
    height: 30px !important;
    width: 10px !important;
    opacity: 0 !important;
  }

}
path {
    stroke: #000000;
    stroke-width: 2px;
    fill: none;
    &.highlighted {
        stroke: red;
    }
}
.upper-rect {
    stroke: #c4bbbb;
    stroke-width: 2;
    stroke-dasharray: 2 1.67 3 1.67 3 1.67 2 0.0001;
    fill: white;
}
</style>
